>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

As a standard action, you can make a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.Fu5eDR99bGo9WdUU#charge]{Charge} without the normal penalty to attack rolls when attacking on a charge, provided that you use an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#operative]{Operative} melee weapon to make the attack at the end of the charge. If the attack hits, you can substitute a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{Debilitating Trick} effect for the damage the attack would deal.
